channel.title: [Help]Mopar Sponsor
channel.description:
I was in the betting page, and then paid the entry fee $5. Then I placed my bet, and did something stupid...I made another sponsor application, not knowing that I was already admitted. I did it to make sure the people knew which server I was, but then when I went back to the betting page it said that my app was being reviewed.
Does this mean I have to pay another $5 to gain entry? I didn't know that I was going to be taken out, this is the second time I've tried betting so I'm still kind of new to this stuff..Also will my server be removed for the month?..

item.title: [Help]Mopar Sponsor
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I don’t understand why you would create another application when you were already approved, since the script goes by most recent thread, it made you not approved anymore. When your application is approved again you will have access to the page again.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help]Mopar Sponsor
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“xGenesis R, post:3, topic:407713”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=508989.msg3692697#msg3692697 date=1312230156]
PM moparisthebest
[/quote]

I’m scared that if I PM him, then I’m disqualified from this month.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Edit: The thing is, I was already approved though :l[/quote]

He’s going to find out anyway, so you’re best Pming him and asking what to do

I’m sure he doesn’t bite. You’ve made a mistake and need help, he isn’t going to disqualify you for being human. You’re not asking him to approve your application so I cannot see why he would be annoyed.

Read full topic
